trackinfo.title: autumn
trackinfo.lyrics: Bloodlike sap from the purple tree Autumn in the air like a faint memory September fun fair, the ride that spins  Wind in my hair and the jumper clings Cloudy afternoon and the sky darkens Rain is drizzling down how each drop dances  Laughter of the children who dont care about a storm Flooding in the potholes where the sewer rats are born The rats they grew up and became politicians Talked in a debate about the holes that still need fixing  An argument ensued cos its the only place for fishing Some old man is gonna make it his god incited mission Every generation gathers to welcome the new year But the oldest ones are cold in tongue, paranoid and fearing The worst their time is short and cursed blessed are the sinners Those who take and break are always gonna be the winners Last spring i got sick i had to stay home through the summer Tried to reason with myself i lost count of the numbers I stole my conscience from a past i cannot quite remember The child who hides within me is looking towards September Don’t just rewind, What’s in front has more to hold, Than what is lost behind. Time, is fickle as the wind, And brittle as the twigs on a bare-branched fruitless tree, Autumn comes again every year and sets me free. From the cares, cos everything ends. Turning on the wheel, Nature doesn’t care how you feel about the loss. It’ll all come back with a little trust.

trackinfo.title: lying awake
trackinfo.lyrics: An early Autumn evening, And the pavements were flooded with leaves. Kicked up as I skipped down the road, Red and amber and green. Saw the strangest sight of all, The courtyard crushed by the scene; An animal hiding in a tree, Scaring the life out of me. A bird and it was calling down, Out from a high-up branch, “Search your thoughts and find some meaning” But my feelings remained untouched. Seething pain inside my soul, Like I was being torn in half Lost and lonely and all I could think of, Was the image of an orphaned calf. Well, I don’t know. There I was, kinda scrawny at nine, Brushing out the knots in my hair. Fed up, tearing up, I lie down on my back, Close my eyes until I’m not there. Guess a number between one and ten, And forget all the others exist. Paint a picture and study up the fixtures, Whatever it takes to resist, Coming out of autopilot, A perfect fix to make use of the wind. Shuffling cards and holding up a placard, Saying something straight or sarcastic, Well I don’t know. And I’m sort of sad to suppose it’s all just fine. When the levee breaks, well, I’ll be the first to hide. And I’ve been lying awake, wishing I couldn’t cry. Because the time is late and I cannot dream a lie. Better lost than pretending I’m right where I want to be, I guess,  And sharing’s overrated though, so I’ll just let the world turn a blind eye. Truth is so undefinable and the worst always follows the best, So starting a fight and making amends can be the same thing once done twice. And as the evening darkened, I fell on the mattress of my bed, Lying face up, staring out at nothing, just wondering what it’s like to be dead, A thought-filled nightmare, I cannot just get away, even though there’s escapes, Brave what’s coming, oh hell, it is numbing me down, I’ll be fine in the end. Well, I don’t know. And I’m sort of sad to suppose it’s all just fine. When the levee breaks, well, I’ll be the first to hide. And I’ve been lying awake, wishing I couldn’t cry. Because the time is late and I cannot dream a lie.

trackinfo.title: fortress
trackinfo.lyrics: Countertop magazines, And old newspapers. From the balcony, I watch the scene unfold. I, don’t wanna feel so small. But I, don’t wanna grow old. Eddie had something ready, In his pocket. Annie braided my hair and cut it. He said that love is caustic. She kept it in a locket. Now i crawl, Through the dark, Forming a picture of the future path. I’ve got time, I can’t grasp. You say its gonna pass me by so fast. I won’t see it ticking by. But I am awake and kicking. High up in your fortress, I couldn't see your wickedness. Your wickedness, Your wickedness, to me. Eddie said it was time, To be someone else. Let your mind fly away and forget this, Body, in all its twistedness. Calming, the spirit in it. Annie had carried her poison with her. And she gave me a sip, To calm the nerves. I, was shaking like a leaf. Her kindness came as a relief. So, I watched, As she danced, To a song inside her head. Then she sang, It to me, It was beautiful and bittersweet. Why? Could I not hold her, Tight, a ghost inside the skin. High up in my fortress, I couldn’t see, Her tenderness, Her tenderness, Her tenderness to me.

trackinfo.lyrics: I’m at war with my own head And it gets noisier when I’m in bed I can’t ignore or just pretend that i don’t hear  the voice that's telling me I’d be better off dead Summer was long and hot and strange, It was hard but I got through it anyway. But when the world is turning cold and bare and grey, I just want to lie in my bed all day. trackinfo.title: alone with you
trackinfo.lyrics: I had time to kill today, So, I called you up to say, “Wanna go for a walk around the lake?” We can lie down in the summer haze. There was little for us to do, So, we just watched the branches move, In the gentle August wind. I felt low but you don’t see it. We sat around and looked away, Watched the wildlife and how it plays, Does this ever feel natural? I don’t know how to act natural. Paint the sky in colours of red, I felt a deep kind of sad when you said, “I think I might go home now.” But I felt more alone before somehow. I don’t know why but I, Felt a little ignored. When you said you liked me when I smiled, Just a little more. And it’s not unlike me to hide, So, it’s not all your fault, But you know I’m trying to be honest, And it feels like I’m being punished, For the result. And I feel more alone with you, Than I do on my own. I feel more alone with you, Than I do on my own. I was bored when you called me along, Sat by your side but didn’t really belong, I walked a mile in the rain for you, I walked a mile in this rain for you, Sat by your side but never really belonged, I walked a mile in the rain for you. I don’t know why but I, Felt a little ashamed. When you said, “You’re all stressed out and isolated these days.” And it’s not unlike me to be shut off, Yeah, I know that statement holds some truth, But lately, I’ve noticed I feel more alone with you, Than I do on my own. I feel more alone with you, Than I do on my own. I feel more alone with you, Than I do on my own. I feel more alone with you, Than I do on my own. I felt more alone with you, Than I did on my own. Well it’s alright, Cos I’ll come back again. It’s alright, Cos I’ll come back again. It’s alright, Cos I’ll come back again. Yeah, I’ll come back again.

trackinfo.title: just to be there, pt. i
trackinfo.lyrics: Cold cases, forest faces, Not a branch for a dove. Old mates and childhood places, They fade as I reminisce them. And as I stood, watching the rain, As it fell on all our lakes. Strangled voices cross the void, And seen but no response. Careless fortune, childish boredom, Takes over at once. Imagination, television repeats and reworks, Maceration, crass division, The strange, euphoric hurt. Make me wonder, Meet me somewhere, Maybe in the dirt. I’ll be there when he needs me most, I’ll lay down my pain and come. Find my place in the frightful cold, Strange kind of solace, From the burning of the world. Am I coming last or coming in first? Just at the back of the race. Well, I don’t know.

trackinfo.title: talk to me
trackinfo.lyrics: Why can’t you talk to me honestly? If you make up some lie, I won’t stay. Guess you can’t hang out tonight, anyway. When you didn’t answer your phone earlier, Well, I was kinda worried about ya. You’ve been seeming so far away. Lost in a place in your mind. When you stay there too long, You get left behind and I know, Sometimes, I read it wrong, But you know that I care And I want you to feel at home. I wanted you to feel at home. I meet you on the porch in the night, It’s 4AM, you’re smoking a joint. I try to be comforting, but I’m not socially apt at this shit. I’ll tell you a joke, make you sorta laugh, You’ll hand me a smoke, and I’ll cough my heart out. And I’ll sing you a song that I wrote, And I’ll cry in the verse, where I say, “I don’t wanna go”. I don’t wanna go. Now, that it’s over, I’m sad, I wish I could find you in my dreams, But they’re full of fucked up menace and it hurts my head. You tell me I’m better at living right, I say, “I’ve been struggling in a fight with myself, It’s a fucking living hell, and I can’t see clearly.” I can’t see anything at all. Can I talk to you honestly? I’ll just make up a lie, you won’t stay. Guess we can’t hang out properly, these days.

trackinfo.title: kaleidoscope
trackinfo.lyrics: Light of a kaleidoscope inside my mind, Spiralling, disoriented. I was a rowing boat in the middle of a sea, Helpless and motionless, I waited. Tricks and traps are not so easy to find, When blindfolded, dizzy and alone. I found my thoughts made the worst company, So sharks may find me, take me home. Then, I’ll be here waiting, Cold, alone and naked. Cos shadows make fine friends, When the emptiness starts aching. I need a hand to hold, Maybe a knife to cut to the bone, Ain’t so bad at all, after all, after alone, after_ After… Laugh at my jokes, I’ll laugh at yours as well, The television’s heaven but my body’s in hell. Dab my tears away, as if you didn’t cause them. Cos, I’ll be a rabbit, in your snare. I am not scared and I don’t want to go home. I’ll be a rabbit, I’ll be a rabbit. I’ll be yours to own. trackinfo.title: I'm a kid, I forget
trackinfo.lyrics: Watching old cartoons, Reminds me of the way you chewed your food, With your mouth half-open. Yellow teeth, sticking out, Picking up worms just to throw ‘em around, I’m a kid, I forget, We’re playing chase in the kitchenette. Orange squash stained my shirt, And we got caught in a blizzard. Locking hands, brittle bones, I press my ear to the stereo. Cotton wool, I clutch it tight, I’m feeling the pull of a satellite. Watching space, the moon and stars, What’s it like out in the universe? All my friends are gone, And now it’s only me and my bedroom. It gets dark in the night, I think I see a creature, It’s gonna break into the house and eat ya alive, It’s gonna eat me alive, Drag me back to its den, I’m staring at the ceiling, Trying not to cry, And I’m scared again, I’m scared again. Too late to make amends with myself, This will never end. Complicate what’s already a mess, Concentrate on whatever’s left. Sing out, no-one will hear, What a way to confront your fear. I’m invisible, I’m a freak. I’ll be alright with catastrophe. All my friends are gone, And now it’s only me and my bedroom. It gets dark in the night, I think I see a creature, It’s gonna break into the house and eat ya alive, It’s gonna eat me alive, Drag me back to its den, I’m staring at the ceiling, Just trying not to cry, But I’m dead again, I’m dead, my friend. I’m dead in my sleep. I’m dead in my sleep. I’m dead in my sleep. I’m dead in my sleep. Staring out through the glass, Sink my feet into the grass, It’s a shame, my head’s a cloud’s, Can’t think of anything now. There’s good in this world I know, But sometimes, it feels like I’m buried below. I’m still a kid, I forget, Cos it’s so dark in here, I can’t see anything.

trackinfo.title: zombie boy
trackinfo.lyrics: And I remember, cos I was there. Felt like December, sometimes, in the summer air. And I know, I know, I know, I don't let it show, but I'm bleeding from the brain, And the crows, the crows, the vicious crows, they torture me and twist my mind insane. I'm a zombie boy, I've numbed my body, so I don't care about the storms. I'm a lost cause, smiling on the surface, but drowning underneath. Does it fool you? This happy kid you see? Cos this joy is shallow and hollow, a broken vase of promises of shelter, I'm already dead and my whole head's corroded. I'm just a zombie, Just a messed up ghost you walk right through. Smoke was rising, A funeral pyre. For all my trying to shut out, That murderous liar. But the dark, the dark, the lonely dark, It wraps around your hands And leaves you blind. trackinfo.title: turning over the soil again
trackinfo.lyrics: Turning over the soil again, Fresh ground, fresh blood among buried men. Turning the soil again. Saw red kites flying above these fields, Photo reels in my eyes, Imprint tomorrow's disguise. What a cold sight, Little bluebottle flies, Clambering the windowsill, Cobwebs between you and I. Small harsh breaths I exhale from my lungs, Heaven is death's sweetest treat when you're young. I'm turning over the soil again. Holding cover to cover of the bed, Making a den out of pillows we found, There is dread and despair in my lonely sick head. I'm a dream, I'm a nightmare, I'm neither I'm aware. There is something out there looking for me, While I'm washing down the daily machines. And I'm alone, And the child has grown, I'm turning over the soil again. And daylight will fade, it never stayed, It died in the Spring back then, And miles will pass, As I turn over the soil again.
trackinfo.credits: from Cassettes for Cain, released July 9, 2022

trackinfo.title: just to be there, pt ii
trackinfo.lyrics: Merry days, cold holidays, With warmth from the fire. We huddle around, Pass around the boxes, And make each other laugh. And I felt like I was home again, Is it a season, a feeling too scarcely spent? Moving house, And making changes, Carrying heavy loads. Discovered floorboards, Blue-bottle flooded ceilings. Make a pot of tea on the stove, In a saucepan, Bring it to the boil, It can mean a moment, Strangers folding in from the corners. And I’ll be there, When I’m needed most. I’ll lay down my pain and come. Find you there, With pieces broke, Take my hand and squeeze it numb. And there is something in this hole, That kinda reminds us of the good. Sometimes, people, they do harm, It hurts, but we heal, we come together, In the hull of it all.
trackinfo.credits: from Cassettes for Cain, released July 9, 2022

trackinfo.title: Strays
trackinfo.lyrics: In the springtime she came  Like a cat with a bell Honestly, honestly what the hell? Tried to give her a pet But she clawed at my wrist Honestly i did not expect this Guess i should've walked away But i was sweet on the stray Honestly maybe i was lonely So i welcomed her in Her spiked tongue licked my skin Cleaning up the blood that she caused to spill It’s been a rough few weeks, Or months or years, or a decade or two. But we’ll make it through, For you’re the truest green, Red and blue, I’ve ever seen. And you’re coming out in me. In the summer, we ran through the fields of gold. Honestly, honestly, I felt whole. Tried to give you a hug, did you love me enough? Honestly, honestly, I don’t know. And as Britain will do, the summer turned cold, Honestly, by this point, I’m used to it. Cos, I get what I want then I lose it all. Honestly, life is kinda hit and miss. I get upset, over some things you said, As you hiss and growl at me. I walk away, you sulk and lay down on the concrete. I’ll bring you this and that, You bring a rat and I chased you both away. I’ll beg of you come back, I knew deep down, That the both of us are strays.

trackinfo.title: Changeling
trackinfo.lyrics: Would you build a kingdom? To justify a crown? Just to craft some freedom? To use to wear me down? Would you welcome me in? But forget my name? Am I what you expected? Do you realise I hide my shame? In the dust and asphalt, Your limbs were dancing wild. I was awakened to my senses, Like a curious child. Was this a prison or a castle? That I walked in naïve, Colourful pretences, Kept my fears up my sleeve. Now, I wear my fear on my sleeve. Maybe I could say I’m sorry, But I’m scared I will amend alone, And even if my heart could take it, I can’t build a bridge on my own. Is there anything to reach for? Or are we nought but ashes? You were in league with a thinking machine, I unexpectedly shed my skin. All the things I kept within, The strange relief of breaking, The piercing song it sings. Were you happy to love me? If only in your way. Now, you can hardly look at me, Was it growth or decay? Would you build a kingdom? Just to throw me out, You were scared of me changing, But where are we now? Where are we now? Maybe I could say I’m sorry, But I’m scared I will amend alone, And even if my heart could take it, I can’t build a bridge on my own. Is there anything to reach for? Or are we nought but ashes? You were in league with a thinking machine, I unexpectedly shed my skin. All the things I kept within, The strange relief of breaking, The piercing song it sings. All the things I kept within, The strange relief of breaking, The piercing song it sings. Were you happy to love me? If only in your way. You were scared of me changing, But I changed anyway. You were scared of me changing, But I was gonna change, anyway.

trackinfo.title: Reverse Time
trackinfo.lyrics: When we leave this place, Do we ever come back? Reverse time with our memories, Find them still intact. Was reality clay? Did our minds play and create with it? A separate state of existence, With all the sharper pieces missing? So we could hold it tight, And not bleed right through. But when I found the knife, It was deep in me and you. Now, I no longer stay, In the rosy shade of a setting sun, We’re packing up, We’re moving on. Our love is ancient, Can I perch on your mountainside? You’ll keep me guessing, all the while. Can we reverse time? When the wind howls wild, Through the echoey arches, The air turns cold and bitter, With the winter marching in. I hold your hand, Tight as gravity holds in the moon, There’s a certain distance, Between us, but a bond beyond ordinary truth. So, when I can’t tell you, Just how much I love you, anymore. You’ll have to look up at the sky at night, And trust I won’t let you fall. Out of this orbit, Out into the vast abyss of darkness, That demons inhabit, I won’t let it be your habitat, no. Our love is ancient, Can I perch on your mountainside? You’ll keep me guessing, all the while. Can we reverse time? Can we reverse...

trackinfo.title: Ocean Song
trackinfo.lyrics: Oh to drown to the ocean floor, And see the creatures there, How they live and love. Soon, I found I could breathe under the water, I swam along, and that was enough. If I could follow the fish again, Would they find me ill or would we all be friends? If all of the oil would rinse away, Would we build cities or revert to a state of decay? I don’t know. But now, all that is breathing is rationed air. And the clouds are sick with the stench of despair. Could I be something in this vast abyss? Of space between the orbit of rocks and the kiss? Of stars whose light spins and dances? Was it all a dream or just a song we sing? I don’t know. Caught again, in this fisherman’s net, I struggled furiously for a bit, But I rested in my defeat and regret. Now, I’m strung like a bullet in a gun, And they tell me lies, Squeeze lemon juice right in my eyes. It’s a fickle man’s bet. If I was to channel my rage and fight? Would I taste their blood or would they feast on mine? Their violence is written into my bones, Do I chisel it out or twist it into something of my own? I don’t know. But now, heaven’s colliding with hellish realms. And how, is hope rational with soldiers at its helm? Could I be something in this vast abyss? Of space between the orbit of rocks and the kiss? Of stars whose light spins and dances? Was it all a dream or just a song we sing? Could I be something in this vast abyss? Of space between the orbit of rocks and the kiss? Of stars whose light spins and dances? Was it all a dream or just a song we sing? I don’t know. I don't know... Oh to drown to the ocean floor, And see the creatures there, How they live and love. Soon, I found I could breathe under the water, I swam along, and that was enough. That was enough. That was enough.

trackinfo.title: Never Met
trackinfo.lyrics: If I was to die in my sleep, Maybe the rain outside my window would weep, A symphony, an ode to me. If I was to live for a thousand years, Maybe I’d eventually adapt to the fear, That lurks so deep underneath. But I wouldn’t be who I am now, Not that I’m the same as I was even yesterday, Midnight blue to indigo hues. And when the weather came, Melancholic rain, Better than the savage heat of the sun, What has come, what has gone. Night arrives as day is done. They never met. If I could assemble the universe, Into a pattern made of colours and words, Could I really see into eternity? And when the planets died, Would I still feel sad inside at all the death? Or would I be stoic? Oh, I wouldn’t be human anymore. Would I even have a soul? I wouldn’t be who I am now, Not that I’m the same as I was even yesterday, Midnight blue to indigo hues. And when the weather came, Melancholic rain, Better than the savage heat of the sun, What has come, what has gone. Night arrives as day is done. They never met. They never met...

trackinfo.title: Mind Games
trackinfo.lyrics: If I could fly like the birds above, I still wouldn’t know where I wanna go. I spent so much time just getting by, I never considered what would follow. Down in my heart, Where there should be answer, There’s just a beat that’s starting to slow down. I don’t belong, I feel wrong existing now. Many miles away, there’s a river calling my name. many miles away, there’s gotta be someone feeling the same. But it all feels so big, and I feel so small and unprepared. Losing again to the mind games I play in my head. Since I was small, I’ve had a thought, That all is balanced on a knife edge. And in its spiral, I’ve been caught, Numb in a limbo of paralysis. Can’t quite accept the darkness that inhabits my mind, Keep it defended from light that could make it vulnerable. I can’t pretend, that everything is fine, Anymore. Many miles away, there’s a river calling my name. many miles away, there’s gotta be someone feeling the same. But it all feels so big, and I feel so small and unprepared. Losing again to the mind games I play in my head. If I could fly like the birds above, If I could fly, I’d fly away. If I could fly like the birds above, If I could fly, I’d fly away. I'd fly away.

trackinfo.title: In The Woods
trackinfo.lyrics: Here, I stand alone. Feel beneath my feet, The icy frost on the concrete. Cannot feel my toes, Cannot tell where they reach, Is there substance beyond the boundary? In the dark of the woods, I heard you calling, I tried to run but now I’m falling. If I try real hard, I can still hear your voice, But now I hear another, Telling me to destroy it. I’ll destroy it. Lighter in my hand, And the weight, it subsides. Flicker in the dark and I wanna, Burn it all, burn it all, Burn it all down. Do you remember the state? That I found you in. Blood was rushing from your side, And I couldn’t stop it. Tried to bandage it up, With the blindfold that was still in your pocket. It wasn’t long enough, And you told me to run, I’m already done for. I'm already done for. Stole the knife and ran, Faster than I’ve ever ran before. Muttered to the head of clan, I’ve got some plans of my own, To settle a score. I’m the demon. I’m the devil now. Living and breathing, In my soul. And they tell me to sleep, And to forget any promise I said I’d keep, To those left behind in the woods. In the woods. In the woods. In the woods. In the woods.

trackinfo.title: Cold Horizon
trackinfo.lyrics: Got a little box i call my own Month to month i feed the wolf To keep it off my back  its a cold horizon Wanna leave a note for when I go Make sure you know i love you dearly And when you visit i see it all so clearly That warmth is old, the news a cold horizon And if you're in, well I'd stop by For a cuppa tea but it’s a cold horizon  When there’s nothing left to talk about And there’s only so much time The rain can live in clouds And I see it now, yeah it’s a cold horizon It’s a cold horizon. Pouring down once again They find me sitting at the edge of my bed Pondering everything But if you visit me when I’m old Grey hairs on my head I might not know your name  But I'll remember the touch of your hand Holding mine squeeze it tight  Keep me smiling keep me fighting Even when its a cold horizon As I watch you lie, you’re barely there, The room is bright, but the mood is like the air, Stale and slightly strange, it’s a cold horizon. And we fix our eyes, upon the screen, It’s easier to watch along than try to bleed, A little talk out of your mind, it’s a cold horizon. And when we leave, you start to stir, Do you recognise me or is it just a yearning for some attention? Your vision is blurred, anyway. It’s a cold horizon. It's a cold horizon. Pouring down, once again. We find you sitting at the edge of your bed. Do you remember anything? But if you visit me when I’m old Grey hairs on my head I might not know your name  But I'll remember the touch of your hand Holding mine squeeze it tight  Keep me smiling keep me fighting Even when its a cold horizon If you visit me when I’m old Grey hairs on my head I might not know your name  But I'll remember the touch of your hand Holding mine squeeze it tight  Keep me smiling keep me fighting Even when its a cold horizon It's a cold horizon And later when, I’m lying here, I’m barely there, confronted by my fears, That all is heading towards a cold horizon. And it’s easiest to just watch along, When I feel something, bleed it out in songs, They ask me where they’re coming from, From the cold horizon.

trackinfo.title: Waiting For a Day
trackinfo.lyrics: Waiting for a day when the wind grows quiet again, Went out walking, I was looking ‘cross the riverbank, Flowers growing, a sight to behold. What’s worth knowing til you’ve grown old? Waiting for a day when I can brace any storm in my coat. Got to talking with myself about the devil and god. I’ve been fighting a war in my mind. I’m still trying to put the demons behind.	 Got to let go. I know I’ve got to let go. Waiting for a day when I can be myself without fear, What’s the point in education if it just leads the kids here? To a station with no trains or destinations, To a road without markings, I was lost in contemplation. Waiting for a day when I can find myself excused from the pain, Bless the morning, bless the hellfires and rain, I’m still trying to work out the depths of the sea. Won’t you trust this raft and swim out with me? Just gotta let go, Of all that I hold, Embers and coals in the palms of my hands, Got to let go, Of all that I hold, Embers and coals in the palms of my hands. Got to let go, Of all that I hold, Embers and coals in the palms of my hands. Got to let go, I know I’ve got to let go. Waiting for a day when the wind grows quiet again.

trackinfo.title: Ultimate Aim
trackinfo.lyrics: Death in the gap between breaths, I let the poison consume me. We live out of step, Every time we meet, it’s a new lease of energy. Warm, your hugs are so warm, I could stay in your embrace forever. And though, the weather is grey, You are my raincoat, and I’m your umbrella. Don’t say that you want to go home, I do too, but I’d rather be here with you than alone. I’ll make sure that you’re safe, always, It’s my ultimate aim, I’ll shield you from pain. The last train departs, at midnight. But I can’t be there on the platform, to say goodbye. Cos I won’t let you leave. I won't let you leave, no. When you’ve gone, I cry, til my sight’s a blur, And nothing looks real. Then, I dry my eyes on the sleeve of my jumper, And I bury what I feel. Cos to feel, is to hurt in a world that taught us evil, And love is a curse, I can’t shake or keep unrevealed. The last train departs, at midnight. I can’t be there on the platform, to say goodbye. Cos I won’t let you leave. I can't let you leave, no. Cos to feel, is to hurt in a world that taught us evil, And love is a curse, I can’t shake or keep unrevealed. Don’t say that you want to go home, I do too, but I’d rather be here with you than alone. I’ll make sure that you’re safe, always, It’s my ultimate aim, I’ll shield you from pain. Don’t say that you want to go home, I do too, but I’d rather be here with you than alone. (Cos to feel, is to hurt in a world that taught us evil,) (And love is a curse, I can’t shake or keep unrevealed.) I’ll make sure that you’re safe, always, It’s my ultimate aim, I’ll shield you from pain. (Cos to feel, is to hurt in a world that taught us evil,) (And love is a curse, I can’t shake or keep unrevealed.)

trackinfo.title: Remains of a Shipwreck
trackinfo.lyrics: Lest I go down forever, Forget me not. Let god forgive me, or better, Anchor twin the rocks. When I was heavy neath the fetter, Why didn’t you carry aloft? Before, the corner was a safety pin, Now I’m buried within a box. I can’t see, Blood among the roses. Can’t really feel, Can’t really think, Strange little song that he composes. We sailed the night like shelter, From watching eyes. The wind was wild in winter, Summer came like a flash of light. Can’t you see? The damage lives unharmed. Can’t you feel? The savage sea is calm. In the remains of a shipwreck, I will swim, Or I will sink. In the remains of a shipwreck, I must swim, Or I will surely sink. I can’t see. Can’t really think. I can’t feel. I might sink.

trackinfo.title: This River / Vanished
trackinfo.lyrics: "This River" This river rules this rowboat. Indigo flowers bloom on the banks so bold. A fever growing in the sky above. Take cover, spare my love. Into this daunting cave, I must go. Until the dawn comes, Promise me you won’t dare to follow. In the distance it glows, Sunrise ahead. I got caught up in all the wrong things. Never imagined it would go like this. I guess the snake of time bites her own tail, Sometimes, to venture forward’s to fail. War to no avail, Breaking to heal. Sunlight’s sweet kiss. Into this daunting cave, I must go. Until the dawn comes, Promise me you won’t dare to follow. In the distance it grows, Sunrise ahead. I’ll be right through, To your house soon. Forgive, somehow, My soul, Immanuel, I’m bruised, My heart is weak and fused, Bring me the water, To wash my wounds. "Vanished" Dream a little about, A time, a place, A hill and a house. A lake, birds by the dozen, You bake, sweet apple pie, So good I could die, And maybe I will in a moment. Memories lost, I can’t put in place, Vanished without a trace. Hide, desperate and wild. Night is close, Hear the wind, how it howls and blows. Try to sever the child, From the dwell of a ghost, Blood in the snow, Snow falls on snow. Ashes will grow. Fractures I can’t, Fix without cost, Lives I’ve lived and lost. Maybe I’m ready, To let it all go. Maybe, we’ll never know. Memories lost, I can’t put in place, Vanished without a trace. Vanished…

trackinfo.title: Insomnia
trackinfo.lyrics: It’s getting late, when you awake, round 1am. I try to tell you to go back to sleep but you won’t have it. Cos you don’t like it being unconscious while I’m awake. You’re whispering, “where do you go?” I’d like to know. So, I take you down to the river, and we sat down on the bank. You ask me why I’m crying, when I said I wouldn’t say, your heart sank. But it’s cos I don’t want to trouble you, It’s not a burden for you to bear. I just wanna keep you safe and happy as long as I can. Cos if you knew, you wouldn’t smile, And I couldn’t bear it. When you’re on the verge of crying, And you’re trying to hide it. I tell you that it’s alright, To let it out from inside, It’s not something you have to hide, From me. Don’t you know it, Don’t you know? Maybe I don’t show it, enough, But I love you. I love you. You rest your head against my arm, I can tell you’re tired. Funny how, ten hours ago, you were running wild. I hesitate to hold you close, don’t want to feel the pain when you have to go. It’s so hard to love a ghost. You fell asleep by the river, I carried you back to your bed. I held back a tear as I watched you lying there, warm under a blanket. I don’t want to see you scared again, Even if you don’t remember the fear yourself, I do, I knew every scar on your skin. I won’t let you see it. Cos if you knew, you wouldn’t smile, And I couldn’t bear it. When you’re on the verge of crying, And you’re trying to hide it. I tell you that it’s alright, To let it out from inside, It’s not something you have to hide, From me. Don’t you know it, Don’t you know? Maybe I don’t show it, enough, But I love you. I love you. Don’t you fade from my mind. Don’t you say goodnight. Don’t you fade from my mind. Don’t you say goodnight. If you wanna cry, If you wanna cry… If you wanna cry, go for it. Don’t you know it, Don’t you know? Maybe I don’t show it, enough, But I love you. I love you.

trackinfo.title: Slowly
trackinfo.lyrics: Honestly, what the hell? I awoke, it was dark again. Didn’t even see daylight today, no. Where are we now? I still get the urge to text you and say, “it’s my fault, I messed up,” You got me down bad, down, oh. Well, I sat and prayed, In the rosy shade of a setting sun. For a future love, for a future of some kind. How is hope rational in this landscape? Midnight blue, indigo hues in my mind. I don’t belong, I feel wrong complaining all the time. I should be content, and just accept, be satisfied. I tried to run, ended up falling. If I get drunk, stop me from calling, It’s not a good idea and it’s not a good time. At the edge of my bed, I replay what I said and cringe at every line. Embers and coals in the corners of my mind. I cry til my sight’s a blur. But still the damage lives unharmed. Bring me the water to wash my wounds. Snow falls on snow. Warm under a blanket, That I hold, close to my heart, But it’s still broken. But it’s healing slowly. Slowly. I tried to run, ended up falling. If I get drunk, stop me from calling, It’s not a good idea and it’s not a good time. At the edge of my bed, I replay what I said and cringe at every line. Embers and coals in the corners of my mind. I cry til my sight’s a blur. But still the damage lives unharmed. Bring me the water to wash my wounds. Snow falls on snow. Warm under a blanket, That I hold, close to my heart, But it’s still broken. But it’s healing slowly. Slowly.

trackinfo.title: Ethereal Flowers
trackinfo.lyrics: I know it hardly shows, but I love you like no other. I lie to everyone I know, But most times, it’s cos I don’t know how to trust them. With you, I hide myself to protect you,  From this thing I’ve become, And as I’m standing in our garden,  I do everything but ask you to come closer, I want to hold you like an emerald in the sky. Would that be alright? Well, I, I have died,  A hundred, a thousand, a million times. But you, you bring me alive. Like ethereal flowers in my eyes. On the winter’s road, I was watching the water. And when it unfroze, well it flooded and surrounded me. And I could feel my boots filling up, And I started to run to wherever I could. But wherever I went, I just felt lonelier. And as it grew, this violent emptiness inside of me, Yeah, I fought back and ran through the derelict forestry, Until I found a bulb, glowing bright in the darkness, That envelopes me like a shroud. And I’m shadowed in clouds. But I, I have died, A hundred, a thousand, a million times. But you, you bring me alive. Like ethereal flowers in my eyes. Like ethereal flowers in my eyes, Like ethereal flowers in my mind, Like ethereal flowers in my eyes, Like ethereal flowers in my life. Well, I, I have died, A hundred, a thousand, a million times. But you, you bring me alive. You’re like ethereal flowers in my eyes. Yeah, I, I have died, A hundred, a thousand, a million times. But you, you bring me alive. Like ethereal flowers in my eyes. Like ethereal flowers in my eyes, Like ethereal flowers in my mind, Ethereal flowers in my eyes, Like ethereal flowers in my life.
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: Salt Into The Sea
trackinfo.lyrics: Avery, you will grow old, Wear your hair long and take hold, The memories that possess control,  Of your outlook and your hope. Terrified to speak out against what you’ve seen, Is it all gone or is it living on in your memory? Throwing salt into the sea,  Breaking rocks down from a boulder. When we awake, we will all be, Just a little bit older, than we were, When we were asleep, time is folding in again. And I can see, that what can start, Eventually ends, inevitably. Steady on your feet as you go over the river, The water rushes faster than you know, If you aren’t careful, it’ll take you under. Yeah, I know it’s about control, And how we’re whispers amid the thunder. Brother, I hope you listen to it, Just a little bit closer. Taking the teeth to your skin, Blood trickles out, poison seeps in. Afraid to believe what you’re feeling, The horror and shame that is terrorising you, It’s true and you can’t deny the catacombs of your mind, You keep behind, little artefacts of a child, Who would run and hide in their own tomb. But it will be alright, my Avery. We’re hurling salt into the sea. My Avery, it’s like throwing salt into the sea. My Avery, you’re throwing salt into the sea. My Avery, it’s like throwing salt into the sea. My Avery, you’re throwing salt into the sea. My Avery, my Avery…
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: Song For Alex
trackinfo.lyrics: Oh, Alex, You’re hitting too strong, Break my bones for me to make me belong. Oh, Alex, You tease my real thoughts, Brewing like a lager in the back of my soul. Oh, well, I always just was. Oh, Alex, You’re bruising my hopes, Help me to get out and sink out of control. Dreaming while drowning is home, It’s hazy in my head and it’s dizzy in the world. Oh, and I always just was. Oh, can’t remember, can’t recall. Oh, Alex, oh, Alex, oh, Alex. Oh, Alex. You’re my only true friend. Let’s run down a river, let the current take us over. And one day, this mystery will end. And we’ll rocket up out of hell and up into space. Oh, I always just was. Oh, can’t remember, can’t recall.
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: Forever More
trackinfo.lyrics: Everywhere we go, my hands are reaching for yours. I’ll brush the hair out of your eyes, They could embrighten me forever more. I don’t want to sleep alone tonight, Could you join me under the covers? I’ll hold you close and I won’t let go, We’ll see through the stormy weather. With your fingers interlocking with mine, I feel like I’m alive, I feel like I’m alive, For the first time in a while. And I don’t wanna wake up, I don’t wanna wake up, I don’t wanna have to say goodbye. I don’t wanna trade the cards I’ve got, For a beautiful lie, for a beautiful lie. Everywhere we go, my hands are reaching for yours. I’ll brush the hair out of your eyes, They could embrighten me forever more. Forever more. Oh, forever more. Oh, forever more. I’ll be crying into your shirt, I’ll be lying on my bedroom floor, Wondering what the hell it was all for. Why do I love you when you’ll never love me back? How do I forget you when you’re all I think about? What was I thinking? What was I thinking? I’ve messed it all up and it’s too late to take it back. I’ve messed it all up and it’s too late. Everywhere we go, my hands are reaching for yours. I’ll brush the hair out of your eyes, They could embrighten me forever more. Forever more. Oh, forever more. Oh, forever more.
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: In The Marshes
trackinfo.lyrics: Salt on the soles, of your Johnston and Murphy’s. You stole me away, from your auntie’s wedding party. Bored to death we ran down to the coast of somewhere blue. Marshes, sand, salt and sulky weather. Take me by the hand, and you pulled me closer. Open up your eyes to the fiery ocean. Laying at your feet, I was such a waste. Dumbfounded, out of place, And untying the shoelace of the situation. I could never be, all you need, all you need. You just take what you want and leave, Just leave me. Just leave me. Show me your fire, let in burn in me. I’ll be alright when it consumes me. We’ll pitch up a tent on a windswept beach. Bathe in the ocean’s water, a friend to the weak. We’ll build a tower, out of muddy branches We found underneath and in the marshes. Hold me in the dirt and bring me solace. Forget all the others, don’t let them control us. And set me free. I’ll set you free. Could I ever be all you need? All you need? Don’t just take what you want and leave. What are we fighting for? What are we fighting for? Let me be yours. Let me be yours. Let me be yours. Let me be yours. You’ll always be mine. You’ll always be mine. You’ll always be mine. Salt on the soles of your Johnston and Murphy’s. You stole me away from your auntie’s wedding party. Bored to death we ran down to the coast of somewhere blue. Marshes, sand, salt and sulky weather.
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: A Ghost In My Skin
trackinfo.lyrics: Mesmerised by the water,  Tranquilised and numb. I was called upon by my father,  Hesitation to run. The sun was blinding me, The noonday heat was savage. The river was winding free,  And I was counting up the damage. The trail up here made a killing,  But the view was something to breathe in. Jagged edge of Helvellyn, The claws of the wind were reaching. A butterfly at the summit,  My eyes glancing down. I was trying to find the fun in it, When something bit my ear, And made me turn around. It’s like a breath of air, yeah, around and within. I know you’re close, you’re like a ghost in my skin. You’re like a ghost. You’re like a ghost. Perched on a mountain so rugged, It’s clutching at my throat. The elders stood at the pulpit, As they excavated the hoax. They said: “Boy, you can’t trust yourself!” “You’ll only cause your own grief!” And as I buried all of the questions in my head, I swear I could’ve felt a tremble beneath my feet. The morning air was bitter, And the snow was melting away. And I held your hand a little more timidly, Than I had just yesterday. You said: “Some things are hard to accept, but denial is the friend of the devil.” “So, watch yourself in these sinking fields, kid.” And I said nothing, nothing at all. Yeah, I said nothing, nothing at all. I just stood and stared, a calf amid the cavalry. And I felt my hairs stand up on my neck, As I silently screamed. And I shook my head, wiped my tears on the sheet. I refused to let the demons become me, And took apart the pages of the books I had read. And I levelled the shaky ground, Helvellyn living within. The coarse Earth to which my body was bound, Feeling like a ghost in my skin. I’m feeling like a ghost in my skin. I’m like a ghost, I’m like a ghost,  I’m like a ghost…
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: The Dead Hours
trackinfo.lyrics: AM, again, the only time that I’m truly alone, Even though I know you’ll text me back,  If I say I’m feeling anxious and so low. I’m crying alone, well crying’s not quite what it is, More like staring at a wall and feeling small and inadequate, To be alive, to live a life, I’m a fraud and I’m a hoax. And the worst part is I know that you’ll always care, And you’ll always try to be there for me. Why do you waste your time on me? Why do you waste your time on me? AM, again, the only time that I’m safe to be a mess, I’d burn the house down with me in it, Just to see if I’d sleep through it with an eye open. And the stupidest thing is that, I’ll always fail and blame someone else for it. Why do I try to run from me? Why do I try to run from me? And the worst part is I know that you’ll always care, And you’ll always try to be there for me. Why do you waste your time on me? Why do you waste your time on me? Why do I try to run from me? trackinfo.title: Little Raven
trackinfo.lyrics: I’m folding the corners of the page, Its plastic’s creased and there’s dirt underneath. The stories written in the brackets, And the soldiers waiting in the barracks, All stare down at me. Cos they can’t see what I see. There’s a child at the table next to me. They’re chewing their teeth on the scenery. Their mother’s cradling a baby, And their father’s staring down at a screen. And they look over at me, Cos, they know I see the way that they see. Little raven with the red hair, Brittle face streaked with aged tears. Yeah, I’ve seen this all before. And I regret to recall the endless nights that I’d cry away, Don’t forget and don’t fade away, Little raven, you’re just starting to learn to be brave. Cos he ain’t ever gonna listen to you, kid. And she is always gonna think that she’s trapped here. And you’ll grow up to see yourself as the dogshit. Cos he will earn your trust and make you his project, And she will shun you into the arms of a cold witch, And she will fuck you up and blame you for it. And the moment you fail him, his faith in you will vanish, And the second you doubt him, he’ll be shouting down your throat. And she’ll ignore you more the older and taller you grow. And he ain’t ever gonna listen to you, kid. And she is always gonna think that she’s trapped here. And you’ll grow up to live in a cold abyss, I know these surroundings, It’s bound to happen around here. Cos it’s bound to happen around here. Can we get out of here, little raven? Cos I’ve grown bitter and I’m slowly hating myself and this world, Just a little bit more than I ever, ever intended to.

trackinfo.title: Small / Bloom
trackinfo.lyrics: I feel ever so small, Sometimes, it feels like I’m nothing at all. Cliché, locked in a box, No escape, just the mess that’s my lot. Don’t hide, don’t run away. Leave now? You should’ve left yesterday. Break down, cry on the phone, Say how everything feels wrong. I owe you everything.  You know what to do. I should be more grateful. But I am just a selfish kid, I never think twice about the damage That I cause, I’m words on a wall, And I can never find the courage. I forgive you for everything you didn’t mean to do. I should be more grateful. I owe you everything, you knew what to do. And I should be more grateful. What do you care? Do you care at all? Maybe I’ll never admit to myself how small I felt,  Under your stare,  I remember looking through you to the wall. I know you were lost in yourself, but that ain’t no excuse. Fuck the past, the future’s new, I’ll let it bloom, I’ll let it bloom. I’ll let it bloom, I’ll let it bloom, I’ll let it bloom…

trackinfo.title: Evidence For Ghosts
trackinfo.lyrics: Out onto the gravel and grit by the forest green garage doors, I stare amiss, my pupils great dark abysses of wonder. From the morning mist in the valley of the Chiltern hills, I’m silent and still, my skin prickled from the winds of November. Does carelessness with bones make for heretics of hope? Evidence for ghosts is thinning out. Everything, I know, fades eventually. It’s better to restore than throw away what’s old. Out the second window, I glance down below at the snow, It was pure like a child’s soul, now scarred by the scares of yesterday’s month. From the cold stone steps of the churchyard walkway, My thoughts delay, like a string played around in the clouds above. Does carelessness with bones make for heretics of hope? Evidence for ghosts is thinning out. Everything, you know, will fade eventually. It’s better to restore than throw away what’s old. It’s fair to say Antarctic rainfall is rarer than snow in April, But I don’t find it unreasonable to accept simple miracles. Like eyes that melt within your own, And the kind of smile that makes a home, I’m all inside, I can’t let it go, Just warm up my bones and I’ll bloom with you. And I’ll bloom with you.
trackinfo.credits: from Evidence For Ghosts, released April 7, 2021

trackinfo.title: On The Moor
trackinfo.lyrics: Immortalised daffodils on the moor. Dream of the meadows, where we were born. The sun shines high on afternoons like these. And as your hair sways like grass in the breeze, We’re holding and we are held. Immortalised daffodils on the moor. Our nightmares may find us once again and haunt, And long nights suffocate the breath. Your mind’s child walks a fine line between rebirth and death. And I see your silhouette when I’m half-awake. Weather fickle and branches so brittle they break. Through the dancing spring and the restful summer’s escape, From this wanting and taking, that festers and invades me when I’m afraid. When I’m ashamed. Collapse into chaos, fraying at the edge. Collect up the rations and count up the damage. For savage nights and hostile days make for bitter creatures. But fawns will suffer at the claws of vultures, Like predators and prey. And I’ll feel the ghost of your hand against my face. Blessed friend I didn’t love enough, you taught me how to be brave. Into oblivion, I will descend til I find my place, In this loss and remaining,  New ground and retracing through memories I’ve kept, Reserved in my caves. The sun will rise, and the sun will set, Simple knowledge we so easily forget. Cos high and low tides will enshrine the ghosts of your past selves, From when you were a child to the last days whose presence you haven’t yet felt. And the world will turn, and my stomach will churn with the weight, Of feeling the hurt and joy of living in the most absurd state. From the raging mind to the brave young fly, I’ve made my mistakes, But I’ve learned to hold them with a little more tenderness, Still, it can never erase the blood that has stained. But then I’ll hear your voice as an echo in my soul. Let it immerse me in the universe and make me whole. In this everything, we are held, and we hold. We are born thriving, screaming and crying, Kicking with life, the immense and the small. The immense and the small.

trackinfo.title: Immortalised Daffodils
trackinfo.lyrics: What if I could find a little peace? Walking out into the fields. What if I could find a place to be still? What if we were immortalised daffodils? Warm under the sun, Our lives only just begun. Beautiful and young, Nothing wrong, nothing wrong, Could ever be done, By us, or to us.

trackinfo.title: Daisies
trackinfo.lyrics: I make chains of daisies, On the hillside, With my favourite friend. She draws round the borders of my mazes, And when the sun’s out, We will play pretend. She’s a wonder indivisible, I am half that, Threads on a fraying end. Half-light and always invisible, But she sees me, And holds my hand. Sweetest flower brimming, With delight, I’m singing to you. Daisies in my heart, Days we’ve spent apart, Can’t be counted on fingers, Anymore. But I still dream, I still do, of course. Sweetest flower brimming, With delight, I’m singing for you. Daisies in my heart, Days we’ve spent apart, Can’t be counted on fingers, Anymore. But I still dream, I still do, of course. I still dream, I still do, of course. Sweetest flower, Every waking hour. Daisies in my heart, Days we’ve spent apart, Can’t be counted, Anymore. But I still dream, I still do, of course. I still dream, I still do, of course. I still dream, I still do, of course.

trackinfo.title: Life in Stop Motion
trackinfo.lyrics: Be free and choose for yourself, All an illusion. Be free and move yourself, Life in stop motion. When I was a child, The world felt a swirling haze. And now that I’m older, I’m still just a kid in its maze. And I felt through the walls, The path to a peaceful place. Inside of my mind, And I hid out there for days. See, when I was three, I wasn’t free at all. From the belt of the car seat, To the driver who kept me small. The road had no atlas to follow, My feet didn’t even touch the floor. In this perpetual static, I felt the absence of control. And when I was twelve, I felt the tension rise. A gun to my neck beckoned action, I couldn’t take, For the sake of my friend’s eyes. Pleading me, Seeing me as his brother of a kind. So, I denied, But the gun still fired, Just with a different result in mind. Now, he’s gone. His blood on the white tile. Now, I’m lost, Buried it for a long while. How to go on? How am I alive? Sing a song, more than one, To remember him by. Be free and choose for yourself? All an illusion. Be free and move yourself? Life in stop motion. Be free and choose for yourself? All an illusion. Be free and move yourself? Life… Life in stop motion, Life, life in stop motion, Life in stop motion.

trackinfo.title: Harbour
trackinfo.lyrics: I'm going back to the place Where the lines are deep and red And the border’s defined By a pencil of lead  The shallow grave of our house And the depths that remain untraced Hidden or buried in my casket case And now the love has faded Tinged in tones of grey The phone rings on unbaiting And i watch with shivering hands Cos it’s easy not to remember But it’s harder to forget And these feelings that you harbour  Don’t make a peaceful place to live You can try to drown them out But they'll be drowning you Cos it’s hard to repress the truth When the lies you kept have broken And it’s time to change the bandages When its bleeding through The wounds have opened up You can’t tape it up and move on Anymore The spring arrives bearing flowers And you visit with a smile We sit and chat for hours  And feel alright for a while But as you go, you'll say Isn't everything okay now? Don’t you know the past is a passing place? Well, the truth is complicated  Like a box, I'd rather keep closed The bruises hesitate to go And while we laugh unchanged It still burns a little low I wish sometimes i could change the channel  and watch an entirely different show Cos it’s easy not to remember But it’s harder to forget And these feelings that you harbour  Don’t make a peaceful place to live You can try to drown them out But they'll be drowning you Cos it’s hard to repress the truth When the lies you kept have broken And it’s time to change the bandages When its bleeding through The wounds have opened up You can’t tape it up and move on Anymore Well, the truth is complicated  Like a box, I'd rather keep closed The bruises hesitate to go And while we laugh unchanged It still burns a little low I wish sometimes i could change the channel  and watch an entirely different show Cos it’s easy not to remember But it’s harder to forget And these feelings that you harbour  Don’t make a peaceful place to live You might try to drown them out But they'll be drowning you Cos it’s hard to repress the truth When the lies you kept have broken And it’s time to change the bandages When its bleeding through The wounds have opened up You can’t tape it up and move on Anymore

trackinfo.title: Do You See Me?
trackinfo.lyrics: I wake bright and early, Just to start my day without you, Clogging up my mainframe. Adjusting my behaviour and my mood, It’s all in the details, i know. I make you a picture, And envision your delight, Such a pleasant surprise, But you chuck it in the bin, Well I guess I'll just set all my drawings on fire. Does it matter if it all burns? Play it up to another of my turns. Do you see me, while you're sat on your throne? Do you feel it, when i cry all alone? Does your heart flood with aching compassion? Or do you mute my voice and not think of me at all? I’m patiently waiting, Entertaining myself in my brain, It gets easier each day, Cos I get so much practice, While you waste my spirits away, Desperate and clinging, You sigh with dismissal, I learn abandon like a secret code, You use to convey your disinterest, And closeness is a dream, I keep locked and closed. In the night, I rock myself, Back and forth, til the fright leaves, I ain’t asking for your help. Cos you don’t see me, from the height of your throne. And you don’t feel it, when I cry all alone. And your heart’s cold and vacant of compassion. You just mute my voice and don’t think of me at all. Is the colour gone? Has the world gone grey? All awash with despair and a strange dismay, For the things in your life that don’t involve me, I’m just a second thought, always a distance away. And I try my best to honour your wish, While I tremble alone from my toes to my wrists, And the darkness grows like a silent abyss, But I won’t know how to cope, wasn’t made for this. And the photographs present happiness, But the videos reveal emptiness, Like a wrapped up box with nothing in it, I wanna go home but I’m already here. And I try to impress you, gain your attention, Bend over backwards for your affection, Dance in your light, soak up your shadows. I’d give anything for some temporary bliss, I’m only a child but I think I deserve this, So yearning subsides and isolation grows. Do you see me, while you're sat on your throne? Do you feel it, when i cry all alone? Does your heart flood with aching compassion? Or do you mute my voice and not think of me? Do you see me, while you're sat on your throne? Do you feel it, when i cry all alone? Does your heart flood with aching compassion? Or do you mute my voice and not think of me at all? Do you see me, while you're sat on your throne? Do you feel it, when i cry all alone? Does your heart flood or ache with compassion? Do you mute my voice and not think of me at all?

trackinfo.lyrics: Ain’t gonna cater to pretence Leave it for later, a convenient loose end Make a statement for defence  I break in a moment of selfishness You hold the cards i roll the dice Feel my heart tremble as we lock eyes I want to kiss you, just on the cheek Ask for forgiveness after permission to speak Cos I said something i shouldn't have Wanted to reach out and hold your hand so bad And when you go i feel almost glad That it’s over Just like a door that’s kept ajar Your love is only so far away from my grasp And it’s so easy to get lost in you I could stay forever no matter the cost I felt something i shouldn't have Wanted to reach out and hold your hand so bad And when you go i feel almost glad That it’s over, this back and forth and back and forth and back oh Ain’t gonna give in to pretence Leave it for later, a convenient loose end Make a statement for defence  I broke in a moment of selfishness Cos I felt something i shouldn't have Wanted to reach out and hold your hand so bad And when you go i feel almost glad That it’s over, this back and forth and back and forth and back oh Well there’s a way to hold a flame As something precious that you give no name  Just to retreat to the shade And wait for the next wave of light I'll run to bathe in and smile Cos this feeling’s more than lust And before dust returns to dust I'll hold it tight inside my chest Let it rest there and enjoy this Fantastical pretence of mine

trackinfo.title: When Love Goes By
trackinfo.lyrics: Look around me, I’m not scared, Is there a point to be fair? Is there a point in being fair? Don’t know whose fault it is, All the things that we missed, The things that I still miss. You were on my mind, It was always you, on my mind. You were on my mind, I meant you, I meant you. But you didn’t care, That I wasn’t there, No, I wasn’t there. You said if I played with fire, I’d get burned in the end, But you’re just a liar. When love goes by… When love went by… You were on my mind, It was always you, on my mind. You were on my mind, I meant you.

Life ain’t always pretty, But pretty things exist in darkness. Like you and I. Blossomed wild in winter, Couldn’t be put out with fire. Like you and I. I’ve been fixing puzzles, You’ve been skipping rope. Just two unknowns. You hold my hand when I’m scared, I carry you back home. You are my home. You are my home. We were only children, But we were charged with a sentence, Meant for evil men. The kind that kept us imprisoned, Locks in our minds, And guards posted at both ends. Is this the end? Is this how it ends? I will kiss your scars softly, If you’ll let me. I still miss your warm heart, Does it miss mine too? I will see you again, only in heaven. I’ll be counting up, from minus seven. Minus seven. I remember running, My heart was thudding loud inside my chest. Was your heart too? I remember humming, A tune to calm you down. You recorded it and put it on a loop. I remember feeling, Like a chick destined for slaughter, Waiting helplessly inside a coop. I remember running, running, Blood-stained shirt, and bruised-up legs, Tired as hell, but somehow still going. Somehow we’re still going. I still remember you, After everything. Your love is snowing down on me. From the open sky. Do you remember me? Like a faded photograph, With a teardrop in my eye. I remember you and I, Millenium babies, born into a burning lie. They bled us dry, oh but we stayed alive. They tried and tried, to turn the day to night. I remember you and I, Millenium babies, born into a burning lie. I will kiss your scars softly, Will you let me? Cos I still miss your warm heart, Does it miss mine too? I will see you again, only in heaven. I’ll be counting up, from minus seven. If we could start again, Seven years earlier, in 1993. Would that give us enough time? To formulate a strategy, To save the younger you and me. If we could start again, Seven years earlier, in 1993. Would that give us enough time? To formulate a strategy, To save the younger you and me. If we could start again, Just seven years earlier, in 1993. Would that give us enough time? To formulate a strategy, To save the younger you and me. If we could start again, Seven years earlier, in 1993. Would that give us enough time? To formulate a strategy, To save the younger you and me.

trackinfo.title: A Decade In The Life
trackinfo.lyrics: I hear them talking downstairs, But I don’t catch a single word, Starting up, it’s 2002. They say something about my brother, Something about the war, It’s 2004. I hear them on the radio, I see them on the tv screen, They’re talking about the state of the economy. I don’t understand a thing they say, And why should I, I’m just a child, It’s 2008. Oh, how time flies, I’m older now, But I’m still just a kid. Oh, how life dies, Blossoms beautiful before giving in. Now I know where I’m at, And where I’m going. My parents are talking downstairs, I’m awake, and they don’t know it, It’s 2009. Something about the riots, Something about the school, It’s 2010. Every month I’m sneaking out, Turning fear into doubt, I’m only twelve. And this is hell, Knocking at my door. Just like it did, Back in 2004. I hear them talking outside, But I can’t make out the words they say, It’s 2002. Something about the weather, Something about the move, We’re driving off, I’m only two.

trackinfo.title: Whale Valley
trackinfo.lyrics: Morning comes too slowly, Here in Whale Valley, I’ve been so unhappy lately. Brother, what’s there to worry about? I’m always looking around for you, On these murky moors. We rush down to the coastline, Look, how death is close by. Share a cigarette in daylight. And maybe, life is lonely, And maybe, death seemed tempting, But maybe, there is something more. We tasted it, once before, It was sweet and salty on our tongues. Rough and real and raw and coarse, Moved through us like poison when we were young. I’ve been looking over all these shores, In our youth what was never won, Was the eternity of the pure, As soon as it bloomed, it was gone, Forever, But didn’t we try to make happy? With whatever, Could make us smile in Whale Valley. I found you in the old barn, You were steps away from paradise, Or hell, I don’t know. You scold me when I try the same, The rope to starve the brain, Hypocrisy, it’s a name you keep close. Well, time is like a dragon, Feeding off our sadness, To dream up our dreams, Ancient Leviathan. And maybe, I am a dreamer, But you were stuck here believing That only your nightmares could come to life. But the silence gets hard to bear, When every time I call out your name, Some days it’s like you’re not even there, Even when I’m leaning on your bedframe. What if in the night, I was to shake your shoulder, What would I do if you didn’t wake? Wouldn’t I be running down to the creature, I’m speechless without the space, To fathom, Oh, just what kind of torture, Can have them all, And blow out all our torches. Forever, We were just trying to feel happy, With whatever, Could make us smile in Whale Valley. Did I ever make you smile in Whale Valley? Did I ever make you smile? We tasted it, once before, It was sweet and salty on our tongues. Rough and real and raw and coarse, Moved through us like poison when we were young. I’ve been looking over all these shores, In our youth what was never won, Was the eternity of the pure, As soon as it bloomed, it was gone, Forever, But didn’t we try to make happy? With whatever, Could make us smile in Whale Valley. Did I ever make you smile in Whale Valley? Did I ever make you smile? Well, time is like a dragon, Feeding off our sadness, To dream up our dreams, Ancient Leviathan. And maybe, I was a dreamer, But you were stuck there believing That only your nightmares could come to life. But maybe I could make you smile. Maybe I could make you smile. Maybe I could make you smile. Maybe, yeah I made you smile.

trackinfo.title: Love Alive
trackinfo.lyrics: Now, we watch the scenes unfold From behind a screen, slowly growing old Time surrounds me like a storm And I know the blood that drips from the thorn, so well Now, we are numb, or so we say To keep ourselves feeling okay How to hold and how to let go From the pouring down of the rain To the falling of the snow 1, 2, 3 4 5.  To love, is to be alive. All is gold in the greenness of now. Warmth beholds the sweetest sound. Death conspiring in my mind so blue, How to dissipate the feeling  I've become accustomed to, so well. Now, we are numb, or so we say To keep ourselves feeling okay How to hold and how to let go From the pouring down of the rain To the falling of the snow From the pouring down of the rain To the falling of the snow 1, 2, 3 4 5.
